mainHero.title: What is
mainHero.subtitle: GeetHub?
mainHero.description: Tired of downloading and the editing the audios from the internet for you to use or use a paid online software? Finally, heres an Open-Source, Audio platform for you to Upload, Edit, Share, Listen and Publish your Audio and Music.

items.title: A Plug-n-Play Interface
items.description: Just upload the audio file you like and start editing it. No need to install any software or learn any thing. Just simple upload and start editing your audio file.

items.title: Make it your own!
items.description: Play around with the audio file and edit it. You can even change the tempo, pitch, volume, and more.

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!
features.description: All the very best technologies have been used to bring you the best experience. We have used the latest technologies to make the experience even better.

items.name: React.js
items.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

items.name: WaveSurfer.js
items.description: A customizable audio waveform visualization, built on top of Web Audio API and HTML5 Canvas

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications using Next.js.

items.name: Netlify
items.description: Netlify unites an entire ecosystem of modern tools and services into a single, simple workflow for building high performance sites and apps.

items.name: Audio Editor
features: Tool to easily edit and manipulate audio file as per your need
Upload, Edit, Share, Listen and Publish your Audio and Music
Supports all the popular audio formats

items.name: Sun-Geet Community
features: Community to Share your Audio and Music
Like, Share and Comment on your favorite Audios
Get notified when someone likes your Audio

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
